steps: Marinate chicken by combining chicken pieces with yogurt, garlic, ginger, turmeric, cayenne, paprika, salt, garam masala, and liquid smoke in a bowl; mix well and set aside
Add all sauce ingredients (onion, tomatoes, carrot, garlic, ginger, and all spices) to Instant Pot; stir to combine
Place marinated chicken on top of sauce (do not stir in)
Close Instant Pot lid and cook on high pressure for 10 minutes
Allow natural pressure release for 10 minutes, then release remaining pressure manually
Remove chicken from pot and set aside
Use immersion blender to blend sauce until smooth and creamy
Stir in half and half (or coconut milk)
Return chicken to pot and stir to coat with sauce
Serve over basmati rice or with naan bread; garnish with fresh cilantro
title: Chicken Tikka Masala
